name: excluded_items
title: Please list all items that you would like to explicitly exclude from the property purchase.
label: Excluded Items
description: This indicates items that you want the seller to remove before Close of Escrow.
tips: List all items attached to the property that you want excluded from the sale.
small_print: All listed items must be removed by the seller before closing unless otherwise specified in writing. You will want to track these requests as you approach closing to make sure your requests are honored.

internal.notes: Items to be excluded from property sale

suggested.hint: This field is optional, so you may leave it empty. Any input you provide will be reviewed by our Smart Buy Team and might prompt us to ask for a bit more information.

fields.name: placeholder
fields.default_value: Enter items to be excluded (one per line, include value if known)
